::DrillBit::

DrillBit rolls out of Autofire's fire, and shoots back at him.
He then sees Mosquitor, and shoots at him.
He is then hit by the auto gun fire, sending him 6 feet down, under
ground.
"SHIT!" He yells from the hole.
